overview_of_class: Critical study of photojournalism to understand how public cultures are shaped by visual public arts and corresponding practices of spectatorship.
name: Visual Rhetoric
title: SoC COMM_ST 453-0-20 Visual Rhetoric

instructors.instructor_addr: 2240 Campus Dr. Rm 2-231 Frances Searle Building

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Critical study of photojournalism to understand how public cultures are shaped by visual public arts and corresponding practices of spectatorship.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
"Ariella Azoulay, The Civil Contract of Photography (New York: Zone Books, 2008)

Robert Hariman and John Louis Lucaites, The Public Image (New York: University of Chicago Press, 2016)

Susan Sontag, On Photography (New York: Picador, 1977)"

subject: COMM_ST
